summary: 2 bad singers are mistaken for top safe-crackers at a bar. A gangster boss orders them to break into 3 safes or else..
cast: Sam Rockwell|Steve Zahn|Michael Lerner|Paul Giamatti|Michael Schmidt|Christina Kirk|Mark Ruffalo|Josh Pais|Harvey Fierstein|Michael Showalter|John Hamburg|Raymond Serra|Ray Iannicelli|Ali Marsh|Jacob Reynolds|Peter Dinklage|Mark Shanahan|Emily Doubilet|Sidney Zubrow|Adam Moreno|Ellen Hauptman|John Tormey|Don Picard|Dee Dee Friedman|Carl Don|Seth Herzog|Allen Swift|Richard Bolster|Brian Mullen|Ian Helfer|Eric Bogosian|Nancy Jenkins|John Samuel Jordan|Marina Kotovnikov|Steve Shampine
title: Safe Men
